message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a price of $14,000. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $14,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. It's a fair price, considering the value it will bring to you. Let me know if that works for you!

Alice, I understand you're looking for a specific price, but I'm still firm on $11,000. It's a fair price considering the value to me, and I'm confident this product will be beneficial.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
